Reflection

As you leave lab and walk across campus, ask yourself some difficult questions:

  • Why must a call to the superclass constructor be the first thing that appears in a subclass constructor?
  • Would you ever want a class to inherit from multiple, independent superclasses?
  • The keyword final can precede class. A final class cannot be subclassed. Why would one want to impose this restriction? (The String class is final.)
